mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT storeCode , storeId , storeName , storeRepresentative , storeNumber , storeBusinessType , storeAddressNumber , storeAddress , storeAddressDetail , storeIntroduction , storeRsvType , storeEmail , storePhone , storeAccountBankName , storeAccountNumber , storeRefundRull , storeImage , storeLevel , storeRegDate FROM tbStore AS s INNER JOIN tbOkaySpace AS o ON s.storeCode = o.okayStoreCode WHERE s.storeName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchName},'%') OR s.storeBusinessType LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchName},'%') OR o.okaySpaceTag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchName},'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE tbStore SET storeId=#{storeId}, storeName=#{storeName}, storeRepresentative=#{storeRepresentative}, storeNumber=#{storeNumber}, storeBusinessType=#{storeBusinessType}, storeAddressNumber=#{storeAddressNumber}, storeAddress=#{storeAddress}, storeAddressDetail=#{storeAddressDetail}, storeIntroduction=#{storeIntroduction}, storeRsvType=#{storeRsvType}, storeEmail=#{storeEmail}, storePhone=#{storePhone}, storeAccountBankName=#{storeAccountBankName}, storeAccountNumber=#{storeAccountNumber}, storeRefundRull=#{storeRefundRull}, storeImage=#{storeImage}, storeLevel=#{storeLevel}, storeRegDate=#{storeRegDate} WHERE storeCode=#{storeCode};
mapper.select: SELECT remainingDay , refundPercent FROM tbRefundPolicy WHERE refundPolicyStoreCode = #{storeCode};
